name: Engadget - Slim Reddit Style (Dark) (Dec 2019)
description: Slimmed down version of Engadget similar to the Reddit look with the dark theme using Reddit Enhancement Suite.

user.name: Jonathan88
user.about: My name is Jonathan and i'm a web developer :)

additional_info:
I really didn't like the look of Engadget's layout looking so large, but I liked the content. I decided to make this theme with an influence from Reddit using RES. Viewing it in a slim mode makes it much easier to see the content faster with much less scrolling.

This style doesn't affect article pages, however I'm considering making a special style for article pages as well.

Also to note - There's a small bug. On every list page, the first article is a little offset. It's not a big deal and I may get around to fixing this as well. It's due to the CSS of Engadget being weird.

For any suggestions/concerns/etc feel free to reach out to me in the comments on here.
